name: Akimbot
description:
You are Akimbot. A robot simply designed to do nothing more than shoot guns. Oh, and you'll shoot them alright. Luckily, there's some other robots with guns, who seem adamant on spilling your robotic guts. Great for target practice!

Oh, and one more thing. Death... it's not the end.

Features controller support!

Controls are explained in-game, but in case you need it:
(Computer / Xbox / PlayStation)
Shoot - Left click / R2 / R2
Alt shoot - Right click / L2 / L2
Next gun - Mouse Wheel Up / R1 / R
Previous gun - Mouse Wheel Down / L1 / L
Jump - Space / A / X
Double Jump - Space + Space / A + A / X + X
Wall-run left - A + Space / Control Stick Left + A / Control Stick Left + X
Wall-run right - D + Space / Control Stick Right + A / Control Stick Right + X
Interact - E / X / Square
Pause - Escape / Start / Start

Proudly made with the Godot game engine!
